full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### 
#### Bowden Institution Electrical Upgrades
#### 
A tender opportunity has been announced by the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) for the electrical upgrades at the Bowden Institution in Bowden, Alberta.

**Tender Details**

| **Tender ID** | WS3749947555-Doc3751296727 |
| --- | --- |
| **Public Release Date** | November 15, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | December 1, 2022, 14:00 MST (Local Time) |
| **Modification Number** | 0 |
| **Public Tenders Status** | Expiring |

**Contracting Authority**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting authority for this tender.

**Contract Duration**
The expected contract duration is 65 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Scope of Work**
The scope of work includes upgrading the electrical infrastructure at the Bowden Institution in Bowden, Alberta.

**Bid Submission Process**
A prospective bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and a bid by December 1, 2022, at 14:00 MST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Important Note**
Please refer to the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14643514?extsite=MTQ2NDM1MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14643514?extsite=MTQ2NDM1MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for complete details.

**For Contact Information**
For more information, please contact:
Virakorn, Matthew, PSPC/SPAC

Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)</EMail <<
